name: OTOM
description:
OTOM is a connect the dots game for people who don't like anxiety.

There is no time limit. No point system. No flashy rewards. Just challenge and methodical progression. Originally designed for iOS, now available as a Mac download.

Every screen some dots will be locked.

Unlock dots by connecting 3 or more. Loops unlock all.

Connecting dots generates power. Use your power to unlock dots on the screen and give you a breather.

Some levels are very tough, others give you time to think and stock up.

The further you go, the more you will learn about the game.
